actions.title: authTest
actions.description: Checks authentication and tells you who you are.

actions.title: channelsHistory
actions.description: Fetches history of messages and events from a channel.

latest.description: Timestamp of the oldest recent seen message.

oldest.description: Timestamp of the latest previously seen message.

count.description: Number of messages to return, between 1 and 1000.

actions.title: channelsInfo
actions.description: Gets information about a channel.

actions.title: channelsInvite
actions.description: Invites a user to a channel.

actions.title: channelsJoin
actions.description: Joins a channel, creating it if needed.

actions.title: channelsLeave
actions.description: Leaves a channel.

actions.title: channelsList
actions.description: Lists all channels in a Slack team.

actions.title: channelsMark
actions.description: Sets the read cursor in a channel.

ts.description: Timestamp of the most recently seen message.

actions.title: channelsSetPurpose
actions.description: Sets the purpose for a channel.

actions.title: channelsSetTopic
actions.description: Sets the topic for a channel.

actions.title: chatDelete
actions.description: Deletes a message.

ts.description: Timestamp of the most recently seen message.

actions.title: chatPostMessage
actions.description: Sends a message to a channel.

text.description: Text of the message to send. See below for an explanation of formatting.

parse.description: Change how messages are treated. See below.

link_names.description: Find and link channel names and usernames.

unfurl_links.description: Pass 1 to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

icon_url.description: URL to an image to use as the icon for this message

icon_emoji.description: emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides icon_url.

actions.title: chatUpdate
actions.description: Updates a message.

text.description: Text of the message to send. See below for an explanation of formatting.

ts.description: Timestamp of the most recently seen message.

actions.title: emojiList
actions.description: Lists custom emoji for a team.

actions.title: filesInfo
actions.description: Gets information about a team file.

count.description: Number of items to return per page.

page.description: Page number of results to return.

actions.title: filesList
actions.description: Lists and filters team files.

user.description: Filter files created by a single user.

ts_from.description: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive).

ts_to.description: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive).

types.description: You can pass multiple values in the types argument, like types=posts,snippets.The default value is all, which does not filter the list.

actions.title: filesUpload
actions.description: Uploads or creates a file.

content.description: File contents via a POST var.

initial_comment.description: Initial comment to add to file.

channels.description: Comma separated list of channels to share the file into.

actions.title: groupsHistory
actions.description: Fetches history of messages and events from a private group.

latest.description: Timestamp of the oldest recent seen message.

oldest.description: Timestamp of the latest previously seen message.

count.description: Number of messages to return, between 1 and 1000.

actions.title: groupsList
actions.description: Lists private groups that the calling user has access to.

actions.title: groupsMark
actions.description: Sets the read cursor in a private group.

ts.description: Timestamp of the most recently seen message.

actions.title: groupsSetPurpose
actions.description: Sets the purpose for a private group.

actions.title: groupsSetTopic
actions.description: Sets the topic for a private group.

actions.title: imHistory
actions.description: Fetches history of messages and events from direct message channel.

channel.description: Direct message channel to fetch history for.

latest.description: Timestamp of the oldest recent seen message.

oldest.description: Timestamp of the latest previously seen message.

count.description: Number of messages to return, between 1 and 1000.

actions.title: imList
actions.description: Lists direct message channels for the calling user.

actions.title: imMark
actions.description: Sets the read cursor in a direct message channel.

ts.description: Timestamp of the most recently seen message.

actions.title: searchAll
actions.description: Searches for messages and files matching a query.

query.description: Search query. May contains booleans, etc.

sort.description: Return matches sorted by either score or timestamp.

sort_dir.description: Change sort direction to ascending (asc) or descending (desc).

highlight.description: Pass a value of 1 to enable query highlight markers .

count.description: Number of items to return per page.

page.description: Page number of results to return.

actions.title: searchFiles
actions.description: Searches for files matching a query.

query.description: Search query. May contains booleans, etc.

sort.description: Return matches sorted by either score or timestamp.

sort_dir.description: Change sort direction to ascending (asc) or descending (desc).

highlight.description: Pass a value of 1 to enable query highlight markers .

count.description: Number of items to return per page.

page.description: Page number of results to return.

actions.title: searchMessages
actions.description: Searches for messages matching a query.

query.description: Search query. May contains booleans, etc.

sort.description: Return matches sorted by either score or timestamp.

sort_dir.description: Change sort direction to ascending (asc) or descending (desc).

highlight.description: Pass a value of 1 to enable query highlight markers .

count.description: Number of items to return per page.

page.description: Page number of results to return.

actions.title: starsList
actions.description: Lists stars for a user.

user.description: Show stars by this user. Defaults to the authed user.

count.description: Number of items to return per page.

page.description: Page number of results to return.

actions.title: usersList
actions.description: Lists all users in a Slack team.
